name: Divine Might
storyline: In the beginning, the Divine God created the civilization called Laia; peace and prosperity reigned for over a hundred years. But a demon lurked in the dark, and it corrupted the minds of the people. It drive them insane and turned them against their God. Eventually, they fell into despair, and were plagued by devils. Their only chance at redemption is in the hands of a single hero...
summary: Divine Might was a mythic fantasy side-scrolling dungeon-crawler game with state-of-the-art 3D graphics that rival those of PC and console games. The game was easy to play, featuring auto-battle and single-touch input.
